title: Analyze Potential for Heat Pump Adoption
description: A utility's electrification program manager wants to identify customers who would be good candidates for switching from a gas furnace to an electric heat pump.

tasks.description: Identify all customers who have both natural gas and electric service.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of dual-fuel customers.

tasks.description: Filter the list to customers with high winter gas usage, indicating they use gas for heating.
tasks.expected_outcome: System narrows down the list to likely gas heating customers.

tasks.description: Further filter the list to customers living in homes of a certain age, as they are more likely to need a new HVAC system soon.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a final, targeted list of high-potential candidates.

tasks.description: Generate a targeted marketing list for a campaign promoting heat pump rebates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the final marketing list.
